summary: A filmmaker explores the lives and deaths of her grandparents, Julius and Ethel Rosenberg, who were executed as spies in 1953.
cast: Sally Kanter Bruin|Bob Considine|David Greenglass|J. Edgar Hoover|Joseph McCarthy|Ivy Meeropol|Michael Meeropol|Rachel Meeropol|Robert Meeropol|Miriam Moskowitz|Richard Nixon|Abe Osheroff|Ethel Rosenberg|Julius Rosenberg|Morton Sobell
title: Heredera de una ejecución
